TriggerLogic.Name: GUI Message
TriggerLogic.Message: Build yourself a base, seek out the enemy and destroy them! You may be attacked.

TriggerLogic.Name: Marker
TriggerLogic.Text: You'll need to find flat ground for some buildings.

TriggerLogic.Name: Marker
TriggerLogic.Text: To move units and hold their formation, select the units, hold control and right click.
